Depends on activities, when you come and food/drinking habits. But after covid-19 this will be something completely new.

That depends on where and what you eat, what you want to do, where you want to go and how you get there. Not to mention sports, theatre, concert (free to very expensive) and the time of year. It is an impossible question to answer. Save as much money that a tourist in Vancouver would spend and consider the exchange rate.Edited: 12:27 am, April 27, 2020
